name: Zodiac Battles
summary:
Choose your zodiac sign, control the element according to your sign and enter the online arena to battle! 
 
Battle other players in an epic all out war against the other signs! Play on a unique world, each having a special ability and home to one of the signs! 
 
Apart from standard modes such as Free for all. Play one of the unique modes such as battle of the 4, where 4 players will fight to the death, each player representing the element of their sign! Player with the highest kills wins!
